# isPlayable

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the media selection option is playable.

## Declaration

```swift
var isPlayable: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

If the media data associated with the option cannot be decoded or otherwise rendered, the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isPlayable
